data.name: Bootstrap Island
data.detailed_description:
Can you handle a ruthless survival experience in Virtual Reality? Step into the buckled shoes of a 17th century explorer, as you get shipwrecked on a tropical island. Bootstrap Island is an intense roguelike survival experience, where you must adapt to survive against overwhelming odds on a mystical island.

Key features:
* Systems-based gameplay in VR with realistic and detailed interactions
* A ruthless roguelike experience with short intense sessions
* A dynamic narrative in an adventure book atmosphere in a historical 17th century setting!
* A dynamic day and night cycle, with vicious beasts attacking at night!
* Tribal natives can become friendly or hostile, depending on your actions
* Adapt to randomized resources and deal with the consequences of your actions!
* An immersive yet comfortable VR adventure, designed with minimal menus and natural feeling controls
* The most realistic survival adventure you can experience without putting your life in danger
